participant_1.name: Max
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and somewhat impulsive, Max is eager to break free from family constraints and explore new relationships and experiences.
participant_1.background: Max works part-time at Burger King while navigating young adulthood, expressing a desire for independence and social adventure.

participant_2.name: Gunnar Deatherage
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Gunnar has a quirky sense of humor and a passion for unique hobbies like sewing and producing web content.
participant_2.background: Gunnar is a college student from Oxford who balances academics with personal projects such as a web series, drawing inspiration from his upbringing and interests.
